name: Dog Days (ParanoidSyntaxError)
description:
You play as a lost dog, running through a forest dodging rifle fire from the local hunters. Try out run them, or get close and bite the bastards.

Complete the forest level to unlock a new dark forest level, with an unholy cultist that lurks the old woods.

Music by HEX_edit+ https://soundcloud.com/user-527465133

Basic controls:

WASD/Arrow keys - Move around

Left mouse button - Bite

Right mouse button - Bark

F - Toggle full screen

Escape - Pause
